pages.text: 15|32|hananim-i ileusigil ibeulliseu yeo nega buboghaneun jajung-e issji anh neun iyuneun mueos-inyo lago mul-euni
15|33|ibeulliseuga malhagil dangsinkkeseo mulg-go geom-eun jinheulg-eulo bich-eun ingan-e ge wae naega buboghayeoya habnikka la go daedabhadeola
15|34|geulihayeo hananim-eun myeonglyeonghasyeoss nani geugos eulobuteo nagala neoneun jeojubad-assnola
15|35|simpan-ui geunalkkaji neoege jeo juga iss-eulila
15|36|ittae ibeulliseuga juyeo buhwal-uigeunalkkaji jeoleul yuyehayeo jusoseo
15|37|hananim-i ileusigil nega yu yedoeneunja gaunde iss-eudoe
15|38|jijeongdoen geu sigan geunal kkajila hasini
15|39|ibeulliseu malhayeossdeola juyeo dangsin-i naleul banghwangtolog hayeossgie jisang-eseo naega geudeul-eul yuhoghayeo geudeul moduleul banghwangke haliyo
15|40|geuleona dangsin-ui jinsilhan jongbog deul-eun je-oedoem-ila hamae
15|41|hananim-i ileusigil naui seong silhan jungbog-i ganeun gil-i naegelo i leuneun olbaleun gil-ila
15|42|sillo neo satan-eun talseonhayeo neo leul ttaleuneun ja oeeneun naui jong eoneunugudo jibae hal su eobsnola
15|43|sillo jiog-eun geudeul moduleul wihan yagsogdoen gos-eulo
15|44|geugos-eneun ilgobgaeui mun-i iss eumyeo geugeos-eun geudeul joeindeul-e baedang doen gaggag-ui mun-ila
15|45|geuleona sillo jeong-uilobge saneun janeun umul-i issneun cheongug-eulo
15|46|pyeong-anhago anjeonhage geugos-e deulgehayeo
15|47|hananim-i geudeul ma-eumsog-e issneunjeung-oleul jegeohalini geudeul-eun hyeongje cheoleom eolgulgwa eolgul-eul maju daehadeola
15|48|geuan-eseo pigonham-i geudeul-eul eomseubhaji anihamyeo ttohan geudeul-eun gyeolko geugos-eulobuteo chubangdoeji anhnola
15|49|naui jungbog-ege illeogalodoe sillo naega gwan-yong-gwa eunhyelo chungmanham ila
15|50|geuleona naui beol-eun gotongseuleo un beol-ila
15|51|abeulaham-ui sonnimdeul-e gwanha yeo geudeul-ege illeojula
